title: Amazing 3bed
posting_body: We are offering a $700 Security Deposit!!!!
Our Senior Community is secluded behind iron gates on 37 beautifully-landscaped acres, which includes 10 completely remodeled residential buildings.
Our 1-bedroom suites start at just $900 / month.
This plan comes complete with a large living room, formal dining room, fully-equipped, galley-style kitchen, large bedroom with a walk-in closet, full bath, and both a linen and hall closet.
Our units are each equipped with stove ranges, refrigerators, and dishwashers.
Our recent renovations include: new kitchens, suite upgrades, new flooring, intercom entry, and a choice of patio or balcony on most suites.
